idea-plugin.name: TinyCompress
idea-plugin.description: Just right-click on the drawable folder or right-click on the image to select Tiny Compress to automatically use tinyPng to compress the image. Before compression, enter key (which can be registered in https://tinypng.com/dashboard/api). If not, the default key will be used (it may be used up by the public)
idea-plugin.change-notes: 1.Optimizing Compression Tips;2.New function to enter your own key
